text: Forgive me Craig if i'm a little confusing sometimes. I have had a condition all my life known as asperger's syndrome. I am one that talks quite a lot. Only recently found out what has been wrong with me all my life. My siblings have been trying to tell me all my life lol. I tend not to think like normal people. I think it gets on peoples nerves as well. It does make life more complicated I think. So it looks like getting myself well versed in vellum should answer questions. Thanks dude!
Thanks, great links, very clear videos. Just what I needed to get started.
You are right, Houdini is better at this than Maya. Much easier to get results. More user friendly than Maya. Maya is a bit of a clunky old thing but does have it's up sides as with certain things.

Haha no problem Oliver i’ve had many friends and colleagues with Aspergers i understand. Yes theres always strengths to each software, i’m a huge houdini fan and luckily get to mostly just use that and not have to use maya so much :smiley:
